desc: We are parents to a special needs boy and we have found products and ideas to help him and our family thrive. When you have a special needs kid, there are a lot of demands that are placed on the whole family. That is why we find it important to get outdoors and be active together and connect with Mother Earth.

layout.text:
You are not alone.
There is a community for you.
We are the Pure Living Family.
We Encourage, Educate, and Support special needs families.
It all starts with a thought. I AM.
